original_text: Then Jesus said to the officer, ‘Go home. You believed that I would make your servant well again. So I will do it for you.’ At that moment, the servant did become well again.
korean_text: 예수께서 백부장에게 이르시되 가라 네 믿은 대로 될지어다 하시니 그 즉시 하인이 나으니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to the officer
You believed that I would make your servant well again
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 네 종을 다시 낫게 할 것을 믿었다

sentences.original_text: So I will do it for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 그것을 너를 위해 하겠다

sentences.original_text: the servant did become well again
